summary: Offline web app for managing real estate listings on a PC, with local-drive storage (including uploads) and Excel-based backend data storage, featuring login, dashboard search/categories, entry forms, agent management, and prioritized buyer/seller lists.
architectural_notes: App is intended to function offline with data persisted to local PC drive.
Backend persistence uses Excel files stored on the computer drive, including references to uploaded media/documents saved on disk.

existing_features.title: Implement an offline-first single-user authentication flow with a landing page login using default credentials username "Vivid@Btm" and password "123456", and require login to access the dashboard.
Add a dashboard settings area that allows changing the login username and password used by the app (replacing the defaults) and persists the updated credentials for subsequent logins.

Persist all application data locally in the browser for offline use (properties, customers/buyers/sellers, agents, notes, links, and uploaded files) with no dependency on network connectivity for core CRUD operations.

Provide Excel-compatible data interchange: allow exporting all stored data to downloadable Excel-compatible files (CSV or XLSX-compatible structure) and importing previously exported files back into the app.

Create the post-login dashboard page with (1) a property search bar, (2) a property-type selector containing: Commercial Land, House, Agriculture Land, Flat, Shops, Rental, and Add Custom, and (3) primary actions for "New Entry" and "Agent List".
Implement the "New Entry" workflow with category selection and category-specific forms, saving each entry locally and making it retrievable via search and view screens.

Implement the Customer entry form with a Sold/Available toggle that visually indicates status (Sold uses red accents; Available uses green accents) and includes fields: Full Name, Address, Contact, Need, Budget, Area, and Custom Requirements/Notes.

Implement the Commercial Land entry form with fields: Owner Name, Contact, Address, Land Area, Negotiable Price, Facing, Road, Mukh Size, Lambai, Nagarpalika, Notes; support attaching Images/Videos/Documents with user-provided custom filenames; and include a Location map link that is clickable and opens in Google Maps when internet is available.

Implement the House entry form with fields: Owner Name, Contact, Location, Built Year, Total Floor, Rooms, Total Land Area, Naksa Pass, Price, Facing, Notes; and support attaching photos, video, and documents with persistent storage.

Implement the Agent List page: show an "Add New Agent" form at the top with fields Name, Address, Contact, Work Area, and Citizenship upload; and list saved agents below with the ability to open/view an agentâ€™s details.

Add a dashboard section that displays a "Top Priority" list of 20 buyers and 20 sellers showing Name, Property Type, Budget, and a "View Detail" button for each item that opens the saved buyer/seller record and displays it.

Create a coherent, distinct visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it consistently across login, dashboard, forms, and lists. Do not use blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add basic PWA/offline support so the app loads while offline after first visit (app shell caching) and provides an English offline indicator/banner when the browser is offline.

Create placeholder forms for Agriculture Land, Flat, Shops, Rental, and Custom categories that at minimum allow saving a title/name, contact, location/address, price/budget, notes, and attachments, so these categories are usable end-to-end even before full field parity is added.

Implement a unified search experience that searches across saved property/listing records (including customers/buyers/sellers where applicable) by key fields such as name, contact, address/location, and property type, and allows opening a matching record from results.
Store all records and attachments in the backend canister as a secondary persistence option and provide a clear local-vs-canister storage mode switch (default to local-only for offline usage).

new_feature_requests.summary: Offline web app with local PC-drive storage for all data (including uploaded media/documents)
Landing page login with default credentials (Vivid@Btm / 123456) and ability to change credentials from dashboard
Excel-based backend storage on computer drive for listings, contacts, links, notes, and related data
Post-login dashboard with property search bar and category selector (Commercial Land, House, Agriculture Land, Flat, Shops, Rental, Add Custom)
New Entry workflow with category-specific forms including Customer and property types (Commercial Land, House, Agriculture Land, Flat, Shops, Rental, Add Custom)
Customer entry form with Sold/Available toggle (red/green form), and fields: Full Name, Address, Contact, Need, Budget, Area, custom requirements/notes
Commercial Land form with specified fields, notes, uploads (images/videos/documents with custom filenames saved to PC drive), and clickable Google Maps location link
House form with specified fields, notes, and uploads (photos/video/documents) saved to PC drive
Agent List page with add-new-agent form (Name, Address, Contact, Work Area, Citizenship upload) and list of saved agents
Dashboard section showing top priority 20 buyers and sellers with Name, Property Type, Budget and View Detail opening the saved buyer/seller record
